title: Bio
bio: David John Seltzer (D.J. Seltzer) is an American actor and comedian.

Seltzer has trained in improv comedy at the Upright Citizens Brigade, Endgames Improv, and Leela. He performed in numerous shows in San Francisco, with teams Rapscallion, The Professionals, Vision Quest, and the two person duo, Dave & Rhonda. As well as Weak Coach in Los Angeles.
In 2019, Seltzer created and starred in the comedy web series Kings Are Wild, along with David Shea Henne.
In other words, D.J. Seltzer is a cool guy.
